description: Explore how Crypto.com is redefining digital ownership through its innovative use of NFTs and tokenized licenses. Discover the impact of these technologies on digital assets, intellectual property, and cross-platform compatibility.
keywords: Crypto.com, NFTs, tokenized licenses, digital ownership, blockchain, digital assets, intellectual property, sustainability, innovation
title: Redefining Digital Ownership: Crypto.com's NFTs and Tokenized Licenses
